title: How to Optimize Your Land Management

tasks.task: Implement rotational grazing plan on grasslands.
subtasks: Introduce cool season grasses when appropriate.
Plant and introduce legumes (e.g., Sizer Milk Foster) in grasslands.
Create smaller paddocks for even grazing.
Time departure from grasslands to early November.
Transition cattle to cover crops and crop residue.
Address ending grazing on noxious weeds.
Be prepared to bring cattle home if grazing runs out.
Take cattle home when food becomes scarce.
